title: The Lancaster
itunes:title: The Lancaster
itunes:subtitle: John Nichol describes the history of the iconic WWII bomber aircraft and tells the stories of the men who flew in them. Hisoryextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian, author and former RAF navigator John Nichol describes the history of the iconic WWII bomber aircraft and tells the stories of the men who flew, fought and died in them. Hisoryextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
